verses.verse: ( Do Not Harden Your Hearts) ( 650 3:7-11 ) לְ֭כוּ <WH1980> lə·ḵū Come, נְרַנְּנָ֣ה <WH7442> nə·ran·nə·nāh let us sing for joy לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD; נָ֝רִ֗יעָה <WH7321> nā·rî·‘āh let us shout לְצ֣וּר <WH6697> lə·ṣūr to the Rock יִשְׁעֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3468> yiš·‘ê·nū of our salvation!

נְקַדְּמָ֣ה <WH6923> nə·qad·də·māh Let us enter פָנָ֣יו <WH6440> p̄ā·nāw His presence בְּתוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> bə·ṯō·w·ḏāh with thanksgiving; בִּ֝זְמִר֗וֹת <WH2158> biz·mi·rō·wṯ in song. נָרִ֥יעַֽ <WH7321> nā·rî·a‘ let us make a joyful noise לֽוֹ׃ Prep│3ms ( lōw) to Him

כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî For אֵ֣ל <WH410> ’êl God, גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> gā·ḏō·wl is a great יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD וּמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> ū·me·leḵ King גָּ֝ד֗וֹל <WH1419> gā·ḏō·wl a great עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- above כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm gods.

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer In בְּ֭יָדוֹ <WH3027> bə·yā·ḏōw His hand מֶחְקְרֵי־ <WH4278> meḥ·qə·rê- are the depths אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ’ā·reṣ of the earth, וְתוֹעֲפ֖וֹת <WH8443> wə·ṯō·w·‘ă·p̄ō·wṯ peaks הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> hā·rîm and the mountain לֽוֹ׃ Prep│3ms ( lōw) belong to Him.

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- is His ל֣וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) , הַ֭יָּם 3220 Art│N-ms ( hay·yām) The sea וְה֣וּא 1931 Conj-w│Pro-3ms ( wə·hū) for He עָשָׂ֑הוּ 6213 V-Qal-Perf-3ms│3ms ( ‘ā·śā·hū) made it, וְ֝יַבֶּ֗שֶׁת 3006 Conj-w│N-fs ( wə·yab·be·šeṯ) the dry land. יָדָ֥יו 3027 N-fdc│3ms ( yā·ḏāw) and His hands יָצָֽרוּ׃ 3335 V-Qal-Perf-3cp ( yā·ṣā·rū) formed

בֹּ֭אוּ <WH935> bō·’ū O come, נִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֣ה <WH7812> niš·ta·ḥă·weh let us worship וְנִכְרָ֑עָה <WH3766> wə·niḵ·rā·‘āh and bow down; נִ֝בְרְכָ֗ה <WH1288> niḇ·rə·ḵāh let us kneel לִֽפְנֵי־ <WH6440> lip̄·nê- before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עֹשֵֽׂנוּ׃ <WH6213> ‘ō·śê·nū our Maker.

כִּ֘י <WH3588> kî For ה֤וּא <WH1931> hū He אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê·nū is our God, וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> wa·’ă·naḥ·nū and we עַ֣ם <WH5971> ‘am are the people מַ֭רְעִיתוֹ <WH4830> mar·‘î·ṯōw of His pasture, וְצֹ֣אן <WH6629> wə·ṣōn the sheep יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> yā·ḏōw under His care. הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm Today, אִֽם־ <WH518> ’im- if בְּקֹל֥וֹ <WH6963> bə·qō·lōw His voice, תִשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <WH8085> ṯiš·mā·‘ū you hear

אַל־ <WH408> ’al- do not תַּקְשׁ֣וּ <WH7185> taq·šū harden לְ֭בַבְכֶם <WH3824> lə·ḇaḇ·ḵem your hearts כִּמְרִיבָ֑ה <WH4809> kim·rî·ḇāh as you did at Meribah, ( LXX as you did in the rebellion; Meribah means quarreling; see ; cited in and .) כְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> kə·yō·wm in the day מַ֝סָּ֗ה <WH4532> mas·sāh at Massah בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> bam·miḏ·bār in the wilderness, ( LXX in the day of testing in the wilderness; Massah means testing; see .)

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer where נִ֭סּוּנִי <WH5254> nis·sū·nî tested אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> ’ă·ḇō·w·ṯê·ḵem your fathers בְּ֝חָנ֗וּנִי <WH974> bə·ḥā·nū·nî and tried Me, גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- though רָא֥וּ <WH7200> rā·’ū they had seen פָעֳלִֽי׃ <WH6467> p̄ā·‘o·lî My work.

אַרְבָּ֘עִ֤ים <WH705> ’ar·bā·‘îm For forty שָׁנָ֨ה׀ <WH8141> šā·nāh years אָ֘ק֤וּט <WH6962> ’ā·qūṭ I was angry בְּד֗וֹר <WH1755> bə·ḏō·wr with that generation, וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> wā·’ō·mar and I said, עַ֤ם <WH5971> ‘am are a people תֹּעֵ֣י <WH8582> tō·‘ê go astray, ( LXX They always go astray in the heart) לֵבָ֣ב <WH3824> lê·ḇāḇ whose hearts הֵ֑ם <WH1992> hêm “ They וְ֝הֵ֗ם <WH1992> wə·hêm and they לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- have not יָדְע֥וּ <WH3045> yā·ḏə·‘ū known דְרָכָֽי׃ <WH1870> ḏə·rā·ḵāy My ways. ”

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- So נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <WH7650> niš·ba‘·tî I swore on oath בְאַפִּ֑י <WH639> ḇə·’ap·pî in My anger, אִם־ <WH518> ’im- “ They shall never יְ֝בֹא֗וּן <WH935> yə·ḇō·’ūn enter אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... מְנוּחָתִֽי׃ <WH4496> mə·nū·ḥā·ṯî My rest. ” ( Cited in , , and )
